title: summoner spell item serries
body:
since we have the jungle items that change the way smite works, would it be interesting to you if we had an item series that changes spells like ignite/flash/exhaust?

ideas on what those items would do and ehat parts of the summoner spell they change?

replies.body: It would be interesting, but how would you do it as those don't have much room to do this stuff. you might be able to get away with a heal one, like doubling the Ms duration or something. But Ignite and exhaust don't give any options for improvements.

They could allow Exhaust to carry a second charge.  They could make Exhaust even more severe for the same duration.

They could make heal work like Redemption's Active.  They could make heal also give back some Mana like Clarity for ARAM.  They could make heal also break a CC.

There are plenty of ways to supercharge an item.  Being viable and not totally broken would become the problem.

theres plenty ways to make viable options for those, and really makes you have to think about your summoners.  giving a support/dmg/tanky/other mode for each would be nice. i just get tired of champs always rotating through the same eight items depending on whats more powerfull atm
